title: Persons qualified to take blood specimen
context: ยง263A-2 Persons qualified to take blood specimen. No person, other than a physician, registered nurse, or person licensed in a clinical laboratory occupation under section 321-13, may withdraw blood for the purpose of determining the alcoholic content therein. This limitation shall not apply to the taking of a breath specimen. [L 1991, c 274, pt of ยง1]
